scenarios.title: Understanding Machine Learning Basics
scenarios.description: Learn fundamental concepts of machine learning and AI

scenario.context: You need to choose the right AI approach for predicting customer preferences.
scenario.challenge: Which machine learning approach is most suitable for this task?

options.text: Use rule-based programming with fixed conditions
options.feedback: Rule-based systems lack the flexibility to adapt to changing patterns.

options.text: Implement supervised learning with historical customer data
options.feedback: Perfect! Supervised learning is ideal for prediction tasks with labeled data.

options.text: Apply unsupervised learning without any training data
options.feedback: Unsupervised learning isn't optimal for prediction tasks requiring labeled examples.

scenarios.title: Data Quality and Preparation
scenarios.description: Learn the importance of data quality in AI systems

scenario.context: Your AI model's performance is poor despite using advanced algorithms.
scenario.challenge: What's the most likely cause and solution?

options.feedback: More complexity won't help if the underlying data quality is poor.

options.text: Examine and improve data quality, cleaning, and preprocessing
options.feedback: Excellent! Data quality is often the most critical factor in AI success.
Longer training won't solve fundamental data quality issues.

scenarios.title: Model Selection and Evaluation
scenarios.description: Learn to choose and evaluate appropriate AI models

scenario.context: You need to select an AI model for medical diagnosis assistance.
scenario.challenge: What factors are most important in model selection for this critical application?

options.text: Choose the model with highest accuracy only
options.feedback: Accuracy alone isn't sufficient; interpretability and reliability are crucial in healthcare.

options.text: Balance accuracy, interpretability, reliability, and safety considerations
options.feedback: Perfect! Medical applications require comprehensive evaluation beyond just accuracy.

options.text: Use the most popular model in the industry
options.feedback: Popularity doesn't guarantee suitability for specific applications and requirements.

scenarios.title: AI Integration and Deployment
scenarios.description: Understand best practices for deploying AI in real-world applications

scenario.context: Your AI model works well in testing but fails in production.
scenario.challenge: What's the best approach to ensure successful deployment?

options.text: Deploy the model as-is and fix issues as they arise
options.feedback: This reactive approach can cause significant problems in production.

options.text: Implement gradual rollout, monitoring, and feedback systems
options.feedback: Excellent! This systematic approach ensures safe and effective deployment.

options.text: Retrain the model with more data
options.feedback: More data might help, but deployment issues often involve infrastructure and monitoring.

scenarios.title: AI Performance Optimization
scenarios.description: Learn to optimize AI systems for better performance and efficiency

scenario.context: Your AI system is accurate but too slow for real-time applications.
scenario.challenge: How do you optimize for speed while maintaining quality?

options.text: Reduce model complexity without considering impact on accuracy
options.feedback: This might improve speed but could significantly harm performance quality.

options.text: Implement model optimization techniques, efficient architectures, and hardware acceleration
options.feedback: Perfect! This comprehensive approach balances speed and quality effectively.

options.text: Use sampling to process only a subset of data
options.feedback: Sampling might miss important information and reduce system reliability.
